thread.title: Toronto man used library computer to access child porn, police allege
thread.title_full: Toronto man used library computer to access child porn, police allege | CP24.com

author: Paul Johnston, CP24.com
title: Toronto man used library computer to access child porn, police allege
text:
A 31-year-old Toronto man has been charged after police allege he used a computer at a public library to look at child pornography.
The alleged incident took place at around 3 p.m. on June 17.
The location of the library where the incident allegedly occurred was not provided by police.
A suspect was arrested Thursday in connection with the investigation.
Wendell Francis is charged with accessing child pornography and possession of child pornography.
He was scheduled to appear in court yesterday.
Anyone with information is asked to contact police at 416-808-8500 or Crime Stoppers at 416-222-TIPS (8477).
